author: TheOneMightyArc
install_msg: AntiRaid installed. Use `[p]antiraid toggle` to turn it on and `[p]antiraid action` to set the punishment.
name: AntiRaid
short: Prevents raids by monitoring message velocity and mentions.
description: Monitors chat for spam (message velocity) and mass mentions. If a user exceeds the limits, it automatically mutes, kicks, or bans them.
